dcterms:creator: Giovanni Da San Martino
Seunghak Yu
Alberto Barrón-Cedeño
Preslav Nakov
dcterms:description: The Propaganda Techniques Corpus (PTC) is a dataset used for fine-grained propaganda detection in news articles. It consists of a training set of 350 news articles with 16,965 sentences, a development set of 61 articles with 2,235 sentences, and a test set of 86 articles with 3,526 sentences. The dataset is imbalanced, with 14.28% of sentences labeled as propaganda.
dcterms:title: Propaganda Techniques Corpus (PTC)
